valid: For the period 00:00 (UTC) on Mon 29 Dec 2025 to 00:00 (UTC) on Tue 30 Dec 2025
general_synopsis: High 200 miles southwest of Iceland 1039 slow-moving, intensifying 1040 by 1800 Monday. Low Trafalgar 1007 losing its identity

Viking.text:
Wind
In west, northerly 5 to 7. In east, northwesterly 6 or 7, veering northerly 6 to gale 8.
Sea state
In west, rough, becoming very rough later. in east, rough, becoming mainly very rough.
Weather
In west, wintry showers. In east, showers, turning wintry.
Visibility
In west, good, occasionally moderate. In east, good, occasionally poor.
Viking.gale_warning:
Gale warning
Issued:
16:00 (UTC) on Sun 28 Dec 2025
Northerly gale force 8 expected later
